mapper.select: SELECT * from eq_characters_record ecr ORDER BY get_time desc LIMIT 1

SELECT ecr.user_name, ecr.get_time, ec.star, ec.id, 1 as lv, ec.name, ecr.eq_name, ec.eq_type, ec.eq_type2, ec.wl_atk, ec.hy_atk, ec.ds_atk, ec.fd_atk, ec.wl_def, ec.hy_def, ec.ds_def, ec.fd_def, ec.camp, ec.introduce, ec.profession, ec.zl_def from eq_characters_record ecr LEFT JOIN eq_card ec on ec.id=ecr.id ORDER BY get_time desc LIMIT 100
